page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT-JOBS.
page.content: From a{survey}inside{Hob Moor School we found the following information:B.R. are the largest single employer (14%).17% of our fathers work in the building trades,whilst 11% work in the two chocolate factories.14% of the sample were{unemployed. { York Carriage Works}was built in 1884;the 20 individual workshops cover 46 acres.2750 people are employed at the works. There are a few industrial sites in {Acomb.}Most obvious is the British Sugar Corporation,where sugar beet is made into sugar.Next to the factory is a printing works and a place where concrete and gravel products are sold.The{River Ouse}passes near these factories.The York Water Works is at Acomb landing:there are reservoirs there as well.
